mapper.select: SELECT t.number number, t.name name, t.sex sexCode, if(t.sex='M','男','女') sex, t.tel tel, t.email email, t.img_path img FROM admin t WHERE t.state='1' AND t.number=#{number}

SELECT c.code collegeCode, c.name college, t.number number, t.name name, t.sex sexCode, if(t.sex='M','男','女') sex, t.tel tel, t.email email, t.img_path img FROM teacher t left join college c on t.college_code=c.code WHERE t.state='1' and c.state='1' and t.number=#{number}

SELECT co.code collegeCode, co.name college, cl.grade_year year, cl.name major, stu.clazz_number clazz, stu.number number, stu.name name, stu.sex sexCode, if(stu.sex='M','男','女') sex, stu.tel tel, stu.email email, stu.img_path img FROM student stu left join clazz cl on stu.clazz_number=cl.number left join college co on cl.college_code=co.code WHERE stu.state='1' and cl.state='1' and co.state='1' and stu.number=#{number}

UPDATE
admin teacher student
SET tel=#{tel},email=#{email} WHERE number=#{number} and state='1'

UPDATE
admin teacher student
SET img_path=#{img} WHERE number=#{number} and state='1'
update admin set name=#{name},sex=#{sex},tel=#{tel},email=#{email} where number=#{number} and state='1'
update teacher set name=#{name},sex=#{sex},tel=#{tel},email=#{email},college_code=#{collegeCode} where number=#{number} and state='1'
update student set name=#{name},sex=#{sex},tel=#{tel},email=#{email},clazz_number=#{clazz} where number=#{number} and state='1'
